name: DynamicProviderConfig

properties.name: endpoint
properties.description: Allows you to configure necessary service endpoints.
properties.rawdescription: Allows you to configure necessary service endpoints.

properties.name: layout
properties.description: Allows you to configure page title, field and button labels, messages, etc.
properties.rawdescription: Allows you to configure page title, field and button labels, messages, etc.

properties.name: navigation
properties.description: Allows you to configure routing and navigator properties for the provider page.
properties.rawdescription: Allows you to configure routing and navigator properties for the provider page.

properties.name: tab
properties.description: Allows you to configure tabs for the provider page.
properties.rawdescription: Allows you to configure tabs for the provider page.

description: Allows you to fully configure a provider configuration page.
rawdescription: Allows you to fully configure a provider configuration page.
